chapters.title: The Boon of Immortality
chapters.description: Hiranyakashipu seeks a boon from Brahma, crafting clever conditions to avoid death.

chapters.title: The Divine Child
chapters.description: Prahlada, Hiranyakashipu's son, worships Vishnu against his father's wishes.

chapters.title: The King's Wrath
chapters.description: Hiranyakashipu challenges Prahlada and mocks Vishnu, claiming his invincibility.

chapters.title: Manifestation of Narasimha
chapters.description: Lord Vishnu appears as Narasimha, fulfilling the conditions of Hiranyakashipu's boon.

chapters.title: Justice Delivered
chapters.description: Narasimha slays Hiranyakashipu at twilight on a doorway, upholding divine justice.
